member.name: ID2D1Device.ClearResources
member.summary: Clears all of the rendering resources used by Direct2D.
member.param: Discards only resources that haven't been used for greater than the specified time in milliseconds. The default is 0 milliseconds.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1Device.CreateDeviceContext
member.summary: Creates a new device context from a Direct2D device.
member.param: The options to be applied to the created device context.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the new device context.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1Device.CreatePrintControl
member.summary: Creates an object that converts Direct2D primitives stored in into a fixed page representation. The print sub-system then consumes the primitives.
member.param: The target print job for this control.
The options to be applied to the print control.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an object.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
The print format is not supported by the document target.

member.name: ID2D1Device.CreatePrintControl
member.summary: Creates an object that converts Direct2D primitives stored in into a fixed page representation. The print sub-system then consumes the primitives.
member.param: The target print job for this control.
The options to be applied to the print control.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an object.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
The print format is not supported by the document target.

member.name: ID2D1Device.GetMaximumTextureMemory
member.summary: Sets the maximum amount of texture memory Direct2D accumulates before it purges the image caches and cached texture allocations.
member.returns: The maximum amount of texture memory in bytes.

member.name: ID2D1Device.SetMaximumTextureMemory
member.summary: Sets the maximum amount of texture memory Direct2D accumulates before it purges the image caches and cached texture allocations.
member.param: The new maximum texture memory in bytes.

member.name: ID2D1Device
member.summary: Represents a resource domain whose objects and device contexts can be used together.
